mapper.select: SELECT ENTR_ITEM_CODE, SOC_TYPE_CODE, PROD_CD, ENTR_ITEM_NM, STATUS_CD, MEMO, CREATE_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATE_DT, UPDATE_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as UPDATE_DT FROM TB_GFN_ENTR_ITEM WHERE ENTR_ITEM_CODE = #{entrItemCode}

SELECT ENTR_ITEM_CODE, SOC_TYPE_CODE, PROD_CD, ENTR_ITEM_NM, STATUS_CD, MEMO, CREATE_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATE_DT, UPDATE_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as UPDATE_DT FROM TB_GFN_ENTR_ITEM
WHERE STATUS_CD = '1'
ORDER BY ENTR_ITEM_NM
SELECT ADD_ITEM_CODE ,ENTR_ITEM_CODE , STATUS_CD FROM TB_GFN_ITEM_MAP WHERE STATUS_CD = '1' AND ENTR_ITEM_CODE = #{entrItemCode}
mapper.update: update TB_GFN_ITEM_MAP m set (m.status_cd, m.delete_id, m.delete_dt) = ( select '1', #{deleteId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate from TB_GFN_ADD_ITEM a where a.ADD_ITEM_CODE = m.ADD_ITEM_CODE and m.entr_item_code = #{entrItemCode} ) where exists ( select a.ADD_ITEM_CODE from TB_GFN_ADD_ITEM a where a.ADD_ITEM_CODE = m.ADD_ITEM_CODE and m.entr_item_code = #{entrItemCode} and a.status_cd = '1' )

update TB_GFN_ITEM_MAP m set (m.status_cd, m.delete_id, m.delete_dt) = ( select '1', #{deleteId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate from TB_GFN_ENTR_ITEM e where e.entr_item_code= m.entr_item_code and m.ADD_ITEM_CODE = #{addItemCode} ) where exists ( select e.entr_item_code from TB_GFN_ENTR_ITEM e where e.entr_item_code = m.entr_item_code and m.ADD_ITEM_CODE = #{addItemCode} and e.status_cd = '1' )
